requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 1 GhzCore 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7 or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Separate mouse strongly recommended

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Any processor w/ a clock rate of 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10;
  • Processor: CPU with 2 cores of 2,4 Ghz;
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card that supports DirectX11 and with at least 1 GB of VRam;
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10;
  • Processor: CPU with 4 cores of 2,4 Ghz;
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX11 support and with at least 2 GB of RAM (nVidia GTX660 or higher, or AMD HD5870 or higher);
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
